sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BreakpointObserver, Breakpoints } from '@angular/cdk/layout'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { map, shareReplay } from 'rxjs/operators'; @Component({ selector: 'app-side-nav', templateUrl: './side-nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./side-nav.component.css'] }) export class SideNavComponent { isHandset$: Observable = this.breakpointObserver.observe(Breakpoints.Handset) .pipe( map(result => result.matches), shareReplay() ); constructor(private breakpointObserver: BreakpointObserver) {} } AboutMe() introduction knowlege T-Al-D-WebPortfolio
